headline.main: QUISLING THREATENS NORSE RAID REPRISALS; Swedes Hear of Many Arrests -- British Spur Resistance

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Jan. 2 -Drastic reprisals against loyal Norwegians were threatened today by Major Vidkun Quisling's press in connection with the British raids against the Norwegian islands of Vaagsoe and Maaloy and the latest raid against the Lofoten Islands.
abstract: Maj Quisling warns of reprisals against loyal Norwegians
